'''"Fresh Buds From Mountains and Waters"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Fresh Buds From Mountains and Waters" is obtainable from [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.
